enableFrostProtection.title: Enable frost protection
enableFrostProtection.description: Enable frost protection mode for all devices.

enableOff.title: Enable off
enableOff.description: Enable off mode for all devices.

includeAliasesInConfiguredNames.title: Include aliases in configured names
includeAliasesInConfiguredNames.description: If true, device names from Heatzy app will be included in HomeKit names (defaults to false).

heatzySyncInterval.title: Heatzy sync interval
heatzySyncInterval.description: Interval in minutes between each background sync with Heatzy API.
